name: INDONESIAN GHOST V2.0.5
description:
APA YG BARU 2.0.5

-PEMILIHAN LATAR CERITA

-LOCK AND UNLOCK LEVEL

-SECRET SCENE/EASTER EGG

-LEVEL 2

-FIX BUG SHOP

WHAT'S NEW 2.0.5

-CHOICE OF STORY BACKGROUND

-LOCK AND UNLOCK LEVELS

-SECRET SCENE / EASTER EGGS

-LEVEL 2

-FIX STORE BUGS

什么是新的 2.0.5

-修复商店错误

INDO SUBTITLE

GAME INI ADALAH GAME HOROR ADVENTURE BUATAN INDONESIA DAN GAME INI DIBUAT DI MAX 2D BERCERITA TENTANG SEORANG PETUALANG YG TERSESAT DIHUTAN INDONESIA SEPERTI APA KISAH NYA.... TIDAK SUPPORT IOS

ENGLISH SUBTITLE

THIS GAME IS A HORROR ADVENTURE GAME MADE IN INDONESIA AND THIS GAME IS MADE IN MAX 2D STORY ABOUT AN ADVENTURER WHO WAS LOST IN THE INDONESIAN FORESTS LIKE WHAT THE STORY WAS LIKE.... does not support IOS
